name: Himara canyon (full)
description:
Beautiful Canyon, with its famous 100 m waterfall, nice palm trees inside, leads to Dead Sea.

Approach

Park your car at the end of the canyon and take the shuttle to the start point.

Descent

First water fall "the 100 m one" can be done with the water, but there's small abseil to reach the canyon ground then to attach the main rope again.

Exit

Better to leave the vehicle in the hotel or at the end point and to take a shuttle to the start point.

Red tape
